data.name: World Boss
data.detailed_description:
Join the World Boss Discord!


About the Game

Calling all Gladiators! Rise to the top of the leaderboard and claim the title of World Boss.

World Boss combines fast-paced shooter action with io and roguelike progression to create a crazy multiplayer arena extravaganza. Wield a large range of weapons, use a multitude of abilities, employ unique tactics and build your Gladiator to suit your playstyle. Drop into the arena at any time to dominate your opponents in order to unlock the ultimate power of the World Boss. How long can you hold the crown?

A new title from PlaySide Studios, creators of Age of Darkness: Final Stand, partnering with some of the genre's most well-loved content creators. Coming soon!

Early Reviews

“Whoever made this game is a genius” lazarbeam game creator - 10/10

“hehehehehehehe” fresh - 10/10


Community Links

Join Lazarbeam, Fresh and the World Boss community on Discord!

Follow us on Twitter for news and updates!

data.short_description: Join Lazarbeam and Fresh in the battle for the World Boss crown in this fast paced PVP shooter. FPS gameplay meets io and roguelike progression with a wide range of weapons and abilities to employ across a host of scenic maps. A lightweight and accessible multiplayer experience for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD Athlon Silver PRO 3125GE
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
